item.title: Tulsa Art Deco and Architecture with Expert Guide Walking Tour
item.description:
Expert guides and insider access! We are proud to lead the highest rated architecture tour in Tulsa.
Meet at our office in a dazzling Art Deco landmark in the heart of the Deco District. You'll explore a variety of buildings both inside and out. Before the tour, fuel up at local roaster Topeca Coffee right next door.
This is a public group tour that runs most Saturday mornings (9am or 10am depending on the season).

image.alt: Tulsa Art Deco and Architecture with Expert Guide Walking Tour

item.title: Oklahoma City Indoor Skydiving with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Experience free-fall conditions with winds of up to 175 miles per hour (282 kilometers per hour) without jumping out of a plane with this Oklahoma indoor skydiving experience. Enter a vertical wind tunnel that simulates a skydive, complete with equipment. Your guide is on-hand at all times as you experience simulated free fall, making this tour a great introduction to skydiving for novices.

image.alt: Oklahoma City Indoor Skydiving with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: Self-Guided Oklahoma City Scavenger Hunt: Wild Western Art
item.description: Part walking tour, part scavenger hunt, this adventure gets you and your crew exploring Oklahoma City’s artsy side—gamified. Led by your smartphone, you’ll hunt for clues, solve trivia, snap photos, and explore from National Memorial to Bricktown and beyond. With each person taking on their own interactive role, you’ll work together to rack up points and declare OKC victory.

image.alt: Self-Guided Oklahoma City Scavenger Hunt: Wild Western Art

item.title: The Dinner Detective Murder Mystery Show - Oklahoma City, OK
item.description:
At The Dinner Detective, you’ll tackle a hilarious and challenging crime while you feast on a fantastic dinner. Just beware! The culprit is hiding in plain sight somewhere in the room, and you may find yourself as a Prime Suspect before you know it! Our engaging and unique murder mystery dinner theatre performances have been playing across the country since 2004.
Our show is very different from traditional murder mystery dinner shows. We will hide non-costumed actors in the audience that are pretending to be part of the crowd. This results in a much more social and interactive evening than with other shows. Our shows are set during the present day and take place in real time. Over the course of the night, our costumed Detectives will uncover clues, interrogate audience members that may or may not be part of the show, and help everyone get closer to solving the mystery.

image.alt: The Dinner Detective Murder Mystery Show - Oklahoma City, OK

item.title: Yellowknife Private Northern Lights Tour with Transportation
item.description: Experience an unforgettable adventure in Yellowknife with your loved ones on Private Northern Lights Searching experience, where you and your party can immerse yourself privately in the breathtaking beauty of the auroras! Enjoy a convenient private hotel pick-up in a comfortable vehicle, led by a knowledgeable photographer guide who takes you to the best spots away from city lights. Learn about solar winds, Earth's magnetic field, night photography and ancient tales that celebrate these lights. Witnessing the northern lights offers a unique blend of education and awe, making it a must for your bucket list and creating lasting memories of the wonders of our universe. Savor complimentary hot beverages and snacks while marveling at the stunning northern lights, creating an enchanting atmosphere. After this awe-inspiring experience, your guide will safely return you to your hotel, leaving you with cherished memories of nature’s spectacular light show. Tour not wheelchair accessible.

image.alt: Yellowknife Private Northern Lights Tour with Transportation

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City by Crazy Dash
item.description: Enjoy a unique way of exploring Oklahoma City with this self-guided, app-led scavenger hunt. With the app, engage with a remote host, receiving a checklist of thrilling challenges and objects to discover across the city. Complete tasks and find objects at your own pace, earning points for each accomplishment. A remote host is available for assistance and there are no time constraints so you can explore at your own pace.

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City by Crazy Dash

item.title: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City with Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Celebrate the magic of the season this year with Holly Jolly Hunt. Holly Jolly Hunt is an app based scavenger hunt that you can play anywhere of your choosing. Explore the city and look for holiday related items, both traditional and not so traditional. Take a photo through the app to score points for your scavenger hunt team. Perform fun, holiday challenges that will bring laughter to your team. See your score on the leaderboard compared to other teams from all over. Holly Jolly Hunt is guaranteed to provide lasting holiday memories. Whether you play with friends, family, or even co-workers, Holly Jolly will put a smile on your face for the rest of the year!

image.alt: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City with Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Self Guided Tulsa Scavenger Hunt: Center of the Universe
item.description: Get to know Tulsa with your friends, colleagues, or family on this app-led scavenger hunt titled Center of the Universe. The average time it takes is two hours, but this can be flexible because it is just your group (max 10 people recommended). Solve clues and answer trivia questions, learning about the Oil Capital Historic District, and Brady Arts District along the way.

image.alt: Self Guided Tulsa Scavenger Hunt: Center of the Universe

item.title: Tulsa Tirade Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Tulsa Tirade Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Tulsa History Tour with Underground Tunnels
item.description: The tunnel tour is a Tulsa bucket list experience! But the most interesting part of the tour will be the stories your guide brings to life about the historic buildings we visit that are connected by indoor hallways and tunnels.

image.alt: Tulsa History Tour with Underground Tunnels

item.title: Oklahoma City Scavenger Hunt by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: Explore Oklahoma City with 3Quest Challenge! Our scavenger hunt lets you explore the city to find items (given to you in the form of a riddle) and perform fun tasks for points. These items and tasks are provided to you on our scavenger hunt app and are divided into 3 different quests! Find all items in quest 1, then quest 2, then quest 3 to complete 3Quest Challenge! If you'd like to make the game even more intense, set a time limit for yourself for 2 hours and see how many quests you can complete in the allotted time. You'll have a remote host during the game that will communicate with you via chat if you need help. Get out and explore Oklahoma City with 3Quest Challenge!

image.alt: Oklahoma City Scavenger Hunt by 3Quest Challenge

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Norman by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers takes you on an adventure in Norman to survive the zombie apocalypse! Use our app and some strategy to find a list of items needed to survive, in any order you'd prefer, around the city. Find the survival items to get points and do fun zombie themed challenges for points as well. Contrive a plan to get your survival team the most points in order to survive the apocalypse! Your remote host will follow along virtually and provide support if you need it. Can you survive the apocalypse in Norman?

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Norman by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Oklahoma City to Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) - Departure Private Transfer
item.description: To get to Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) in relaxed, VIP style, skip hailing a taxi. With this private transfer service, your driver will pick you up directly from your Oklahoma City lodging, help you with your luggage, and show you to your ride. From there, you can simply sit back and enjoy the short journey, arriving recharged and ready—and on time—for your flight.

image.alt: Oklahoma City to Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) - Departure Private Transfer

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Stillwater OK
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case... murder on the streets of Stillwater.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route.
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Stillwater OK

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Tulsa by Operation City Quest
item.description: In this fun Tulsa scavenger hunt, players will use an app to find objects in the city, in any order they want, to collect points! They'll also complete challenges for points. Players can see their score on the app's live rankings. All scavenger hunts have a remote host to help along the way. Come explore with us in Tulsa.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Tulsa by Operation City Quest

item.title: Broken Arrow City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers in Broken Arrow will help prove you can survive a zombie apocalypse! Use an app to find a list of items needed to survive. Find them in any order you'd like and get points for each found survival item. Get points also by doing crazy zombie themed tasks. Survey the area and figure out how to get the most points in order to survive the apocalypse. Should you have any questions along the way, a remote host will chat with you throughout the game. Prove to the world you can survive an apocalypse in Broken Arrow today!

image.alt: Broken Arrow City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City by Operation City Quest
item.description: In this fun Oklahoma City scavenger hunt, players will use an app to find objects in the city, in any order they want, to collect points! They'll also complete challenges for points. Players can see their score on the app's live rankings. All scavenger hunts have a remote host to help along the way. Come explore with us in Oklahoma City.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Oklahoma City by Operation City Quest

item.title: Tulsa International Airport (TUL) to Tulsa - Round-Trip Private Transfer
item.description: Experience a seamless journey from Tulsa International Airport (TUL) to Tulsa with an exclusive round-trip private transfer. Skip the chaos of taxi lines and crowded shuttles, and opt for a private, door-to-door airport transfer for ultimate convenience. Your personal driver will greet you with a customized nameplate and expertly track your flight, ensuring a stress-free experience. Enjoy the comfort of a clean and stylish vehicle, driven by a professional chauffeur, with no hidden charges to worry about.

image.alt: Tulsa International Airport (TUL) to Tulsa - Round-Trip Private Transfer

item.description:
Book your Private Arrival Transfer from Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) to Oklahoma hotel or address.
Don't go through all the hassle of waiting in a long taxi or shared shuttles queues and use our private, door to door airport transfer.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

item.title: The Dinner Detective True Crime Mystery Dinner Show in Tulsa
item.description: Our show is very different from traditional true crime mystery dinner shows. We will hide non-costumed actors in the audience that are pretending to be part of the crowd. This results in a much more social and interactive evening than with other shows. Our shows are set during the present day and take place in real time. Over the course of the night, our costumed Detectives will uncover clues, interrogate audience members that may or may not be part of the show, and help everyone get closer to solving the mystery.

image.alt: The Dinner Detective True Crime Mystery Dinner Show in Tulsa

item.title: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Tulsa by Wacky Walks
item.description: Wacky Walks of Tulsa is a great way to see your city! You'll use an app on your phone to play our royal-themed scavenger hunt where you will find items in the city and complete wacky tasks for points! During the game, you will be competing against your group members for the title of King or Queen. Beware, a group member may have a chance to compete for your power and take it away throughout the game. The goal of the game is to remain King or Queen as long as you can while gaining as many points as possible by finding the items and completing the wacky tasks. You can take as long as you want to complete the game and can play in any area of the city you'd like. Wacky Walks comes with a remote host who will be chatting with you through the app in case you need anything along the way. Come play Wacky Walks in Tulsa today!

image.alt: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Tulsa by Wacky Walks

item.title: Farm Adventure Experience in Red Hill Ranch
item.description:
Red Hill Ranch has something for everyone. Visit for a few hours or stay the night in our Lakeview 2 Bedroom 2 bath farmhouse that sleeps 4.
The UTV ride is a great way to tour the ranch and see a portion of the Chisholm Trail, from the highest peak to the low valley where the cattle and cowboys camped at night. The UTVs seat three and are a fun way to get around.
Full Ranch Experience- From feeding the cows, to petting all over the horses this experience will leave you with unforgettable memories.
All about horses or All about cows is just that. Learn all about our cows or our horses with full interaction. This is perfect for a focused experience.
Have a love for tractors? Learn all about our tractors and implements how they work, how we bale hay from start to finish, move dirt, and more. We even offer a short course that allows you to be the driver.
Just go fishing in our private lake.
Add lunch before or after your tour for a delicious farm-to-table meal.

image.alt: Farm Adventure Experience in Red Hill Ranch
